Player History
Signed as a free agent by Oakland on 2/1/1969 to a 4-year deal worth $1,450,000 per year...
Drafted in 3rd round, 50th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1973...
Traded from New York (A) to Chicago (N) on 2/20/1973 (Going to CHC: P G. Cappuzzello. Going to NYY: P J. Thibdeau)...
Injured on 4/15/1973 with a Sore Shoulder, out for 4 days...
Injured on 8/10/1973 with a Tight Shoulder, out for one week...
Injured on 5/3/1980 with a Strained Elbow Ligament, out for one week...
Injured on 6/12/1980 with a Sore Back, out for one week...
Injured on 6/26/1980 with a Blister On Finger, out for 4 days...
Earned first career win on 5/19/1981...
